title: League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro Error...
body:
League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro. League of Legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client.
i have restart my computer many times, i have re-install LOL app too but it's still not working.
how can i fix this? thx, summoner

replies.body: It sounds like your network is losing connection with our servers, which will kick you off, fail to queue you up, and lose other accesses.  I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mPA1cz9Z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-11T21:26:35.246+0000)
>
> It sounds like your network is losing connection with our servers, which will kick you off, fail to queue you up, and lose other accesses.  I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!

DidnÂ´t find anything may you can help me especially with this error eague of Legends has lost contact with Maestro.
